question: plse explain days sunday to Saturday -which days are good to make a baby and which days are not good
answer:
QUESTION

Q1) plse explain days sunday to Saturday -which days are good to make a baby and which days are not good

Q2) Plse explain why this is so and what each day means for this purpose including the time of birth

Q3) Plse explain if baby born on this days and times why is it good and bad

Q4) Someone studying for Hafez etc mentioned this in brief and I'm wanting to know

Q5) Which Hadith, Quranic verse etc.

Q6) How authentic

ANSWER


Share:

At the outset it is important to understand that there is no specific significance for a child to be conceived on a specific day of the week. Many books have been written in this regard, however, this is not supported by authentic references. Therefore, no special significance should be given to this.

Allah knows when the child has been conceived. There is no guarantee to prove that the women would conceive from a specific intimate relation. Therefore do what is within our control and leave the rest to Allah. Pray and cry to Allah to make the child an upright and righteous Muslim. The dua of the parent in favour of the child is effective. While the child is in the womb make dua to Allah for him/her. Surely this will be more effective that relaying in something which has no basis.

And Allah Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
